Item Name: USSSA Tri-State Championship Swing for Bob
Item Description:
(Games could start on Friday evening)

Tri State includes Indiana Illinois and Kentucky

Price is $325.00 5gg Pool Play seeded into bracket play
Price is $250.00 8 and under 5gg Pool Play Seeded into bracket play

Team Awards to 1st & 2nd place
Individual Awards for 1st place & 2nd place

Age Groups 8-10-12-14-16-18 & under “Open” Class A & B
16 & 18 under could be combined for High School Division

20% of Net proceeds will go to the Price family in their time of need Bob Price the coach of Indiana
Outkast was diagnosed with stage 4 cancer in January 2014

What are the Game MVP awards and how do they work?

For each game of the pool play teams will be provided with GAME MVP medals. These medals are to be presented to the MVP player of the game from the opposing team. We ask that you speak with the coaches of the other team to avoid repeat awards of a medal to a player. Example: If a player gets a Game MVP medal during the teams’ first pool game. Please choose a different player for their second game.

Teams still have to meet there own home state requirements to solidify a USSSA World Series berth

All teams have to be USSSA sanctioned
 If you have questions please contact

Jeff Sanders USSSA Indiana State Director @ 812-887-0501 or email @ youthfastpitch@hotmail.com
Go to www.usssa.com  or www.youthfastpitch.net to register for all events
Flyer: /Tournaments/4152262_341991_2013 FP Tri - State for Bob Benefit.pdf

Item Description:
The Lincoln Way Blue Wave would like to invite you to the Wave the Pumpkins Home Fastpitch Tournament to be held on October 11th-13th. The tournament will be held at Heritage Park Sports Complex, which have 4 lighted diamonds, with full concessions, bathrooms and plenty of parking.
NO GATE FEE WILL BE CHARGED.

All pool play games will be 75 minute time limit, no new inning. Bracket Play will be 75 minute time limit no new inning can start. This is a 4 game minimum guarantee 3 pool games into a single elimination brackets. Championship Games will have no time limit.

1 MVP medal per team per game for pool play games for the 9u, 10u, 11u, 12u levels.  Individual trophies and team trophies for 1st-4th place based on 8 teams.
–     The tournament reserves the right to change/modify rules as needed. One game constitutes a
    tournament. In the event of rain, the tournament director reserves the right to change the format.
    Every effort will be made to complete the entire tournament. After 9/11/2014 no refunds will be allowed.  In the event the entire tournament is rained out we will return $395.00, $100.00 will be kept for administrative fees and field costs.

Based on the number of teams, berths will be awarded by USSSA to the 2014 USSSA World Series.

Min games guaranteed: 4-3 pool and single elimination
 
Max teams per division: 8

• Entry Fee $400 – Entry fee is non-refundable unless spot is filled
  • 4 game guarantee, weather permitting, 2 games Pool Play, Double Elimination Tournament
  • 1 game constitutes a tournament if rain a $75 Admin fee will be kept
  • Individual Awards to top 2 finishers
Classifications: /Fast Pitch;/Fast Pitch/Illinois Tournaments;/Fast Pitch/Illinois State Tournaments/14/u;/Fast Pitch/Illinois State Tournaments/16/u;

Item Description:
Round Robin 16U/18U Combined Open
USSSA World Series Qualifier
Sunday, October 13, 2013

 

The Meteor’s Pumpkin Classic is a guaranteed four game, weather permitting, eight team, two pool round robin. Each pool team will play each other once and based on seeding, the top team from each pool will play for first place and the remaining teams for third through eighth.
Classifications: /Fast Pitch;/Fast Pitch/Illinois Tournaments;/Fast Pitch/Illinois State Tournaments/16/u;/Fast Pitch/Illinois State Tournaments/18/u;

Item Name: 2013 Second Annual Fall Blast USSSA Qualifier
Item Description:
• 8 Team Maximum Per Age Group
  • 4 Game Guarantee( 3 Pool Games/Single Elimination With Weather Permitting)
  • $425.00 Entry Fee
  • All Games Will Have A 75 Minute Time Limit – With Exception Of Championship Game
  • During Pool Games We Will Have Free Substitutions & A Continuous Batting Order
  • USSSA Rules Will Apply During Bracket Play
  • All Teams Must Provide Insurance & Birth Certificates And Be USSSA Registered
  • Trophies Will Be Awarded To 1st & 2nd Place Finishers Of Each Age Group
  • HCC Has A Great Concession Stand And A Playground For The Kids
  • 200 Foot Fences For All Levels Except 10U
  • Team Coolers Are Allowed – Outside Food Is Not Allowed
Flyer: /fast-pitch/2013 Belvidere Blasters Second Annual Fall Blast USSSA Qualifier.pdf

Item Description:
Game Times: 90 Minutes Finish the Inning
3 Game Guarantee / Double elimination (No If Necessary Game - Winner Take All)
Maximum Teams: 16 (per age group)
2 "A" Bids; 2 "B" Bids; Bids Base on number of teams entered
Individual Awards for 1st and 2nd Place Teams
No Game Balls Required
Waukegan Park District has 5 parking fee per day

The Carol Stream Storm would like to invite you to the 6th Annual Dupage Ultimate Softball Tournament to be held on September 21st and 22nd.  This tournament will be held at McCaslin for the 12 & 14 levels NO METAL SPIKES ALLOWED!  The 16 & 18 levels will be at 4 surrounding parks or Armstrong if they have not begun construction, fields with concessions, bathrooms and plenty of parking at all locations. – No gate fee will be charged.

This is a 2014 Tournament: example if you are a second year 12U team for 2013, than you would play at the 14U level for this tournament.

All pool play games will be 75 minute time limit, finish the inning and can end in a tie.  Bracket Play will be 75 minute time limit no new inning can start.  This is a 4 game minimum guarantee 3 pool games into a single elimination brackets.  Championship Games will have no time limit.  1st & 2nd place team and individual trophies.

The tournament host has the right to modify this due to weather conditions, which will result in reduced game times or cancelation of games.  Two games per team constitutes a tournament – if your team gets only 1 game in you will receive 50% of your money back, if you get zero games in we will return all, but a $75.00 admin fee.

Based on the number of teams, berths will be awarded by USSSA to the 2014 USSSA World Series.

Minimum Games Guaranteed: 4 (3 pool play into a single elimination)

Max Team per Division: 12
Classifications: /Fast Pitch;/Fast Pitch/Illinois Tournaments;/Fast Pitch/Illinois State Tournaments/12/u;/Fast Pitch/Illinois State Tournaments/14/u;/Fast Pitch/Illinois State Tournaments/16/u;/Fast Pitch/Illinois State Tournaments/18/u;
Venue: Glasshagel Park, Kent Park; Walter Park; Armstrong Park & McCaslin Parks

Item Name: Windy City Invitational Conference NIT Series
Item Description:
Windy City Invitational Conference NIT Series
Men’s Major Tournament
June 7-9 Inwood Sports Complex – Joliet IL & Volunteer Park Romeoville IL

Welcome to the Windy City Invitational Conference event.

Major/A/B/C/ & D teams are welcome to participate in this spectacular event held in Joliet for the 6th year. This tournament has been attended by the top USSSA Conference teams and has quickly become one of the top 3 in all the Conference Tournaments.

Non-Conference teams are encouraged to participate and play against some of the best Slow Pitch softball players in the Nation.

This is a USSSA Conference event.

Selected events are Men’s Conference USSSA NIT’s. These events award paid berths and travel awards to previously unqualified teams based on the number of non-conference USSSA teams of each class participating in the event.

Conference USSSA NIT travel awards can accumulate and may be awarded to a team more than once.

The number of paid berths and travel awards are determined by National Office after all entries to the event have been accepted. No berth will be given per class unless there are 2 or more non-conference teams from a particular class participating in the event. No travel award will be given per class unless there are 3 or more non-conference teams from a particular class participating in the event. There are no travel awards given to ANY Class B teams from a Conference USSSA NIT.

All travel money will be sent to the official host hotel and credited to the team’s rooms for the appropriate World Tournament. If the team chooses not to stay at a host hotel the travel money will be forfeited.

And any Class D team losing out on Saturday that does not have a World Tournament berth will be put in a single elimination bracket and the winner receives an unpaid Class D World Series berth. All "D" teams must confirm they will play on Sunday am in the single elimination tournament. If a team "no shows" or forfeits after confirming their participation... there will be a $100 forfeit fee.

The below listed hotels are accommodating this year’s Major and we hope that you stay at one of these listed hotels. Please make your room reservations ASAP so if we need more rooms for the teams we can still get them. Rooms have been blocked at the below listed hotels under USSSA Windy City. Hampton I-80 and Towne Place are in the same area off I-80 and Houbolt exit in Joliet and are across the street from Heroes West Sports Grill with food 40 TV screens and spirits. Heroes West is the headquarters of this Conference event. The Hampton Inn and TownePlace Suites by Marriott are located across the street with a Cracker Barrel Arby’s and McDonalds in the same area. The Empress Casino is also located nearby. The TownePlace Suites by Marriott (approx. 5-10 minutes from Inwood Sports Complex) TownePlace Suites just opened in late 2008 as an extended stay property with a buffet breakfast with a waffle maker and breakfast items to be heated. No bar or restaurant but has a workout room and indoor pool. All rooms are suites with a King bed and a pullout sofa in separate room with kitchen at $104 per night + tax. 2 Bedroom Suites are available for an additional cost. 1515 Riverboat Center Joliet IL 60436 815-741-2400 Fax: 815-741-2399 http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/mdwts-towneplace-suites-joliet-south/ Hampton Inn Joliet I-80 (approx. 5-10 minutes from Inwood Sports Complex) 1521 Riverboat Center Joliet IL 60436 815-725-2424 Fax: 815-725-3110 http://www.hamptoninn.com/en/hp/hotels/index.jhtml?ctyhocn=JOLRBHX Hampton Inn Suites Joliet I-55 (approx. 15-20 minutes from Inwood Sports Complex) 3555 Mall Loop Drive Joliet IL 60431 815-439-9500 Fax: 815-439-9550 http://hamptoninn.hilton.com/en/hp/hotels/index.jhtml?ctyhocn=JOLILHX The Hampton Inn at I-80 and the Hampton Inn at I-55 are both $104 per nite + tax. Make room reservations by May 7 to guarantee rate and availability.
